name: Ice Ryzeal
effectText: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by sending 1 card from your hand or field to the GY. If Summoned this way, you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Rank 4 Xyz Monsters. You can only Special Summon "Ice Ryzeal" once per turn this way. If this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Ryzeal" monster from your Deck, except "Ice Ryzeal". You can only use this effect of "Ice Ryzeal" once per turn.
